contest-event.event-date:
March 5, 2011 D Silkeblæs
SilkeBlæs 100 Entertainments Contest SilkeBlæs silkebls
This contest is held every other year. Until 2002 it was held in even-numbered years. It was held in 2005 instead of 2004 and has since continued in odd-numbered years. The same happened in 2017/8, with the 2018 contest divided into sections.
Jysk Musik- og teaterhus, Silkeborg, Central Denmark, Denmark SOLISTRPISEN: Ida Larsen, Nordvestjysk Brass Band NYSKABENDE VÆRK: Magnus Hylander PERFORMANCE: Nordvestjysk Brass Band VINDER AF SILKEBLÆS 2011: Nordvestjysk Brass Band
March 20, 2011, 12:31 p.m. May 21, 2012, 8:50 p.m.
1 Nordvestjysk Brass Band Jesper Hyllested
2 Concord Brass Band Andras Olsen
3 Århus Brass Band Christian Schmiedescamp
4 Borås Brass Band Magnus Hylander
5 Silkeborg Blaeserne Gert Skovlod Hattesen
6 Svogerslev Brass Band Lars Hædersdal
7 Dania Brass Band Dennis Aaberg Andersen
8 Svogerslev Blaeserne Steffen Mærsk
9 Odense Brass Maria Badstue
